PLUGIN.NAME: FAIT
PLUGIN.DESCRIPTION: Continuous flow analyzer for static checking

PLUGIN.NAME: ROSE
PLUGIN.DESCRIPTION: Quick Repair of Run Time Bugs for Java
PLUGIN.WARNING:
WARNING!:


ROSE is experimental research software.


User actions involving ROSE are recorded and sent to the researchers to help improve the system and to understand its usage. All data is sent anonymously and no user code or code fragments are included. You will only be identified by a random string (you can find it in ~/.bubbles/Rose.props as Rose.user.id).


For more information contact Steven Reiss at spr@cs.brown.edu.


By installing this plug-in you argee to have these terms.
